SELECT
DATE_FORMAT(v.receive_date, '%Y-%m') AS date,
DATE_FORMAT(v.receive_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS date,
DATE_FORMAT(v.kj_approval_date, '%Y-%m') AS date,
DATE_FORMAT(v.kj_approval_date, '%Y') AS date,
DATE_FORMAT(v.kj_approval_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS date,
r.id AS regionId, r.name AS area, a.id AS adviserId, a.name AS consultant, v.currency, v.exchange_rate AS exchangeRate, v.amount, SUM(v.bonus) AS commission, IFNULL(sum(IF(v.currency='CNY',v.expect_amount/v.exchange_rate,v.expect_amount)),0.00) AS serviceFee #SUM(CASE IFNULL(IF(v.currency='CNY',ROUND(v.sure_expect_amount/v.exchange_rate,2),ROUND(v.sure_expect_amount,2)), 0) WHEN 0 THEN IFNULL(IF(v.currency='CNY',ROUND(v.expect_amount/v.exchange_rate,2),ROUND(v.expect_amount,2)), 0) END) AS serviceFee FROM b_visa v, tb_adviser a, tb_region r WHERE a.region_id = r.id AND v.adviser_id = a.id AND v.state IN ('REVIEW', 'FINISH', 'COMPLETE', 'CLOSE')
AND v.kj_approval_date > #{startDate} AND v.kj_approval_date <= #{endDate}
AND r.id = #{regionId}
AND a.id = #{adviserId}
AND a.id IN
#{aid}
GROUP BY
DATE_FORMAT(v.receive_date, '%Y-%m'),
DATE_FORMAT(v.receive_date, '%Y-%m-%d'),
DATE_FORMAT(v.kj_approval_date, '%Y-%m'),
DATE_FORMAT(v.kj_approval_date, '%Y'),
DATE_FORMAT(v.kj_approval_date, '%Y-%m-%d'),
adviser_id ORDER BY v.kj_approval_date DESC;
